description:
Experienced & trustworthy Java Developers. We deliver!
We're a Software Development & IT Outsourcing company from Poland. Our main area of expertise is Java technology.
Our team consists of highly qualified professionals who are passionate about their mission and keep a strong focus on every feature of your project. We are proud not only of our skillset, but also of our experience. 
We work with startups, mid-sized companies as well as telecoms, banks, and technology companies. We also have experience in international projects.
Our location in Poland ensures good & close cooperation with companies in different time zones all over the world. 
We deliver products that meet the needs and requirements of our customers. We build and maintain long-term relationships with our clients. Customer satisfaction is our top priority!
